name: Noteca
overview:
Noteca is a new business web app that makes it easy to manage thousands of relations with people through Social Media, a good-looking and powerful webapp that speeds up and simplifies the everyday of a community manager, public relations team, marketing analystâ€¦

Noteca finds conversations about your brand, product (or whatever you need) in blogs and comments, and then analyzes and tracks them, making it easy to take part of the conversations. Noteca monitors but it is also a conversation and follow-up tool.

Noteca stores and manages all your conversations in Social Media in one app and provides stats on them. This way, you can detect what is valuable to people, the concepts and meanings that make them connect emotionally. With this knowledge itâ€™s possible to create collaboration platforms, stimulate conversations and create brand communities.

Noteca is an app that strengthens the on-line reputation of companies, brands and products. Market analysis companies or marketing agencies need monitoring services to know what is being said about their clients, Noteca provides information to evaluate and support launches, viral marketing or press releases.

Everything that is done in Noteca evolves around the conversations and the people. At the other end of each post or comment there is a person. Noteca will help you maintain a list of people with whom you talked and conversations you maintained.
